INITIAL.DESCRIPTION: Let's set up your Talk community in just a few short steps.

ADD_ORGANIZATION.DESCRIPTION: Please tell us the name of your organization. This will appear in emails when inviting new team members.
ADD_ORGANIZATION.LABEL: Organization Name

PERMITTED_DOMAINS.TITLE: Permitted domains
PERMITTED_DOMAINS.DESCRIPTION: Enter the domains you would like to permit for Talk, e.g. your local, staging and production environments (ex. localhost:3000, staging.domain.com, domain.com).

FINAL.DESCRIPTION: Thanks for installing Talk! We sent an email to verify your email address. While you finish setting up the account, you can start engaging with your readers now.
